pageProduct.name: Palmers Cocoa Butter Micro Fine Exfoliating Facial Scrub 150g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Palmer's® Cocoa Butter Formula Micro Fine Exfoliating Facial Scrub uses natural exfoliants crushed walnut shells and cocoa powder, to gently exfoliate the surface of the skin.

Warnings

For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. If product gets into eyes, rinse thoroughly with water. Keep out of reach of children.

Common Uses

Skin is noticeably smoother and brighter, and better able to absorb treatment products.

Ingredients

Water (Aqua), Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Sodium Laurylglucosides Hydroxypropylsulfonate, Glyceryl Stearate, PEG-100 Stearate, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Extract, Juglans Regia (Walnut) Shell Powder, Sorbitan Sesquioleate, Glycerin, Lauramidopropyl Betaine, Stearyl Alcohol, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Fruit Powder, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Tocopherol, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Oenothera Biennis (Evening Primrose) Flower Extract, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Hydrolyzed Milk Protein, Phenoxyethanol, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Fragrance (Parfum), Ethylhexlglycerin, Tetrasodium EDTA, PVP, Propylene Glycol, Sodium Acetate, Isopropyl Alcohol, Cellulose, Benzyl Benzoate, Benzyl Alcohol.

Directions

Apply to clean, wet skin in small circular motions, avoiding the eye area, then rinse with water. Gentle enough to be used 2-3 times a week or more often depending on skin's sensitivity. Follow with Palmer's Cocoa Butter Formula Moisturising Day Cream or Moisture Rich Night Cream for perfectly hydrated skin.
